scripts.test:timelock:full: npm run compile && MAINNET_FORK=true FORK_BLOCK_NUMBER=13549521 npm run hardhat test test/arc-timelock-full
scripts.test:timelock:update: npm run compile && MAINNET_FORK=true FORK_BLOCK_NUMBER=13549521 npm run hardhat test test/arc-timelock-params-update
scripts.test:arc:full:fork: npm run compile && MAINNET_FORK=true FORK_BLOCK_NUMBER=13632621 npm run hardhat test test/arc-full
scripts.test:arc:full:tenderly: npm run compile && TENDERLY=true npm run hardhat:tenderly -- test test/arc-full
scripts.test:arc:new-permission-admin: npm run compile && MAINNET_FORK=true FORK_BLOCK_NUMBER=14132953 npm run hardhat test test/arc-list-permission-admin
scripts.test:arc:keys: npm run compile && MAINNET_FORK=true FORK_BLOCK_NUMBER=13627327 npm run hardhat test test/arc-transfer-keys
scripts.kovan:timelock:deploy: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- full:deploy-arc-timelock --verify
scripts.main:timelock:deploy: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:main -- full:deploy-arc-timelock --verify
scripts.kovan:proposal:deploy: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- full:deploy-proposal-payload --verify
scripts.main:proposal:deploy: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:main -- full:deploy-proposal-payload --verify
scripts.main:proposal:submit: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:main -- full:submit-proposal
scripts.main:proposal:submit-new-permission-admi: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:main -- full:submit-proposal-new-permission-admin --admin ${ADMIN_ADDRESS} --ipfs ${IPFS_ENCODED_HASH}

npm run compile && MAINNET_FORK=true CHECK=true FORK_BLOCK_NUMBER=${PROPOSAL_CREATION_BLOCK} ADMIN_ADDRESS=${ADMIN_ADDRESS} PROPOSAL_ID=${PROPOSAL_ID} npm run hardhat test test/arc-list-permission-admin
